text: greetings my name is Matt wood and I'm
here at the AWS headquarters in Seattle
to tell you about a new feature which
combines the real-time data collection
of Kinesis firehose with the real-time
data analytics of Amazon elasticsearch
elasticsearch is a popular tool for
managing and analyzing data in real time
and today we're adding the ability to
ingest data directly into elastic search
using Kinesis firehose so with a simple
API call you can push data in real time
into firehose which will scale
automatically and handles all the
underlying stream management of data at
scale and firehose we'll deliver that
data to elasticsearch where it can be
analyzed and visualized in real time
using tools such as Cabana is a great
fit for log analytics and application
monitoring and it's available for all
customers today thanks a lot
you
